cards.name: Armagedrummer
cards.text: Whenever you lose Armor, deal 1 damage to all other minions.
cards.flavor: Design review comments for Amagedrummer: A nice cymbal common.

cards.name: Air Guitar
cards.text: Deal 3 damage randomly split among damaged minions.
cards.flavor: jug jigga jug jigga jug jigga jug jigga jug jigga JAH JAH

cards.name: Mosh-Pit Thrasher
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion. If it survives, gain 5 Armor.
cards.flavor: Mosh-Pit Thrasher is surprisingly compassionate, having helped dozens of moshers recover their lost keys.

cards.name: Double-Neck Destroyer
cards.text: After you attack a minion, gain 2 Armor. Gain 4 if it survives.
cards.flavor: Can't equip two weapons at once? Just glue 'em together!

cards.name: Crowdsurf
cards.text: Choose a minion. Summon a random minion from your hand to attack it.
cards.flavor: Everyone's down until Ultrasaur wants to crowdsurf.

cards.name: Motorhead
cards.text: Charge\nBattlecry: Spend up to 5 Armor. Gain that much Attack.
cards.flavor: His neurologist is also his mechanic.

cards.name: Thrash & Burn
cards.text: Choose a friendly minion. Whenever it takes damage, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
cards.flavor: Stop, drop, and rock'n'roll.

cards.name: Crank It!
cards.text: Set your Armor to 11.
cards.flavor: It goes to 13 if you have 2 extra mana.

cards.name: Enter Sandstorm
cards.text: Deal 1 damage to all minions. If a friendly minion took damage, cast again.
cards.flavor: Exit light, enter sand. Take my sand, we're off to never-ending sand

cards.name: Skash the Soloist
cards.text: Ready for stage when you have lost 10 Armor (wherever this is).
cards.flavor: Skash is rash, brash, and ready to fla-

cards.name: Skash the Soloist Ready
cards.text: This minion also wears your Armor.

cards.name: Attune
cards.text: Give a minion +1/+1.
cards.flavor: Attune Matata - It means no screw-ups, for the rest of your days.

cards.name: Tender Tenor
cards.text: Harmonizes with your third minion this turn.\nLifesteal
cards.flavor: Much better than a well-done Tenor.

cards.name: Mount Up!
cards.text: Give a minion 'Deathrattle: Summon a 3/3 Rider". Harmonizes with Dragons.
cards.flavor: *DISCLAIMER: Card does not actually work on Faerie Dragons.

cards.name: Tuning Fork
cards.text: After you attack a minion, set its Attack to 1.
cards.flavor: NO! NO! BAD OGRE! That's for TUNING, not EATING!

cards.name: Divine Resolve
cards.text: Secret: After your opponent casts a spell, reduce the Cost of a random card in your hand by (3).
cards.flavor: Come on Cyrella, it's CANtor not CANT- wait.

cards.name: Scaled Warden
cards.text: Whenever you play a card that costs (0), draw a card.
cards.flavor: Just A-minor dragon.

cards.name: Goldshire Tailor
cards.text: Your minions cost (3) less while you control no other minions.
cards.flavor: He can give you the finest cuts for dirt-cheap prices, but god forbid you distract him during the process.

cards.name: Secret Chord
cards.text: Replay all friendly Secrets that triggered this game.
cards.flavor: Well, it isn't so secret now that you've revealed all of them...

cards.name: Hallelujah
cards.text: Give a minion +5/+5 and 'Deathrattle: Cast Hallelujah on a random friendly minion.'
cards.flavor: It's a 5 Attack, and it's a 5 Health Hallelujah...

cards.name: Cantor Cyrella
cards.text: Ready for stage once you have played 7 cards that cost (0) (wherever this is).
cards.flavor: I know what I need to complete this piece! Target dummies!

cards.name: Cantor Cyrella Ready
cards.text: Battlecry: This game, a random Legendary minion visits your hand each turn.

cards.name: Amplifying Portal
cards.text: Your spells cost (2) less, but not less than (1).
cards.flavor: It's like a summoning portal, but A LOT LOUDER!

cards.name: Rebel Yell
cards.text: Discard a random card. Give your minions +2/+2.
cards.flavor: Get this - you get TWICE the lotus, for four times the cost! AND you get to discard a card, for free!

cards.name: Chemical Romance
cards.text: Summon a 6/6 Demon with Lifesteal and Rush for both players.
cards.flavor: The bands getting back together!

cards.name: Hardcore Hellbat
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of a 0-Attack minion for you.
cards.flavor: He says he's hardcore, but he probably hasn't beaten Molten Core even once.

cards.name: Hellsteed
cards.text: Deathrattle: If it is your turn, resummon this minion.
cards.flavor: Dreadsteed's estranged cousin who went off to study music in Fel Salvador.

cards.name: Reverb Eredar
cards.text: Harmonizes with your second minion this turn.\nBattlecry: Deal 3 damage to all other minions.
cards.flavor: Sings karaoke with Jaraxxus on Tuesdays.

cards.name: Tone-Deaf Frontman
cards.text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion with less Attack than this. If it was friendly, draw 2 cards.
cards.flavor: THAT GUY'S ON OUR SIDE? WHAT? SORRY I CAN'T HEAR YOU AT ALL.

cards.name: Disco Panic
cards.text: Replace your hand with all other cards you discarded this game.
cards.flavor: I chime in with a... Malchezaar? Where did you put the Disco ball?

cards.name: The Burning Parade
cards.text: Summon copies of your minions. Set the copies Attack to 0.
cards.flavor: Legion? Invasion? No, no, you misunderstand. We're a marching band.

cards.name: Bassist Balnazzar
cards.text: Ready for stage once you have targeted 4 friendly minions with your cards (wherever this is).
cards.flavor: Destroying Arthas was his job, creating killer basslines is his passion.

cards.name: Bassist Balnazzar Ready
cards.text: After you play a minion, give minions in your hand and deck +1/+1.

cards.name: Revenge Demon
cards.text: Lifesteal Rush

cards.name: Post-Life Prowler
cards.text: Deathrattle Resummon a random 1-Cost friendly minion that died this game.
cards.flavor: Death? I prefer the term post-life.

cards.name: Grateful Dead
cards.text: Summon a 1/1 Zombie with Taunt. Draw a card.
cards.flavor: Thank you for resurrecting me! Wait, is that a DeathwiAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA

cards.name: Sustain
cards.text: Discover a spell. Harmonizes with spells.
cards.flavor: Warning: Prolonged useage may result in nausea, fatigue, and death.

cards.name: Feedback
cards.text: Trigger a Deathrattle. If that kills a minion, draw 2 cards.
cards.flavor: Alright guys, we need to think of something different. Our last performance literally killed a man.

cards.name: Northshire Vitalist
cards.text: Deathrattle: If this died at the same time as another minion, resummon this.
cards.flavor: Ties are for losers.

cards.name: Abbey Herald
cards.text: Battlecry: Choose a minion you played this turn. Summon a copy of it.
cards.flavor: Clones! Get your clones here, limited time only!

cards.name: Improv Shadowcaster
cards.text: Your spells cost (2) less while you have no Mana.
cards.flavor: Ok, so let me get this straight. You have no minions, no cards, and no Mana... I can make this work.

cards.name: Noisecore Gnome
cards.text: When your opponent casts a spell on this, Counter it and Silence this.
cards.flavor: He CAN'T HEAR YOU!

cards.name: Unlivin' On A Prayer
cards.text: Resurrect 7 friendly Deathrattle minions. Destroy them.
cards.flavor: Woah, we're halfway dead!

cards.name: Freak Zappa
cards.text: Ready for stage when this has been summoned 3 times (wherever this is).
cards.flavor: A frequenter of Goldshire Inn, Freak Zappa always orders a magnifecent pancake breakfast.

cards.name: Freak Zappa Ready
cards.text: Deathrattle: Gain a random Deathrattle and shuffle this into your deck. It keeps any Deathrattles.

cards.name: Beatboxer
cards.text: Rush. Harmonizes with spells that killed a minion.
cards.flavor: Boots 'n' cats 'n' boots 'n' cats 'n' boots 'n' cats

cards.name: Defias Deckmaster
cards.text: Combo: The next card you play this turn costs (1) less.
cards.flavor: The Defias Brotherhood bought Wynnstock tickets for all its members!

cards.name: Fire-Spitting Dragon
cards.text: Combo: Deal 7 damage.
cards.flavor: Spittin' bars hotter than 777 degrees!

cards.name: Echoboom Mic
cards.text: After you attack a minion, add a copy of it to your hand.
cards.flavor: Hagatha's mic of choice.

cards.name: Freestyle
cards.text: Discover a Combo card. Cards you've already played are shown first.
cards.flavor: Actually, it costs 1 mana.

cards.name: Famished Freebooter
cards.text: Combo: If you've spent all your mana, add a random 0-Cost card to your hand.
cards.flavor: Not so big on music, but I heard there was free food...

cards.name: Second-Rate Swindler
cards.text: Battlecry: Reroll cards in your hand from another class. They cost (2) less.
cards.flavor: In reality, he's really only a third-rate swindler.

cards.name: Chop & Screw
cards.text: Destroy a friendly minion. Combo: Also gain a copy of it.
cards.flavor: Preferable over the Bach Screw.

cards.name: Plunderphonics
cards.text: Replace your hand with a random spell from each class.
cards.flavor: A song that breaks so many frontiers you'll need a psychiatrist

cards.name: Metalface Dilla
cards.text: Ready for stage once you play 6 cards in a turn (wherever this is).
cards.flavor: You're living off borrowed time, the clock ticks faster

cards.name: Metalface Dilla Ready
cards.text: Battlecry: Your next four cards this turn cost (1).

cards.name: Enchanted Treant
cards.text: Harmonizes with Treants.
cards.flavor: How do trees harmonize if they have no ears?

cards.name: Elwynn Ecologist
cards.text: At the end of your turn, add a 2/2 Enchanted Treant to your hand.
cards.flavor: Using their meristempos!

cards.name: Good Trip
cards.text: Choose One - Discover a spell that costs (5) or more; or minion.
cards.flavor: A good trip to the park, of course! What else could that mean!?

cards.name: Green Thumb
cards.text: Gain a Mana Crystal. Add two 2/2 Enchanted Treants to your hand.
cards.flavor: Contrary to popular belief, goblins make terrible farmers.

cards.name: Magic Manashroom
cards.text: Refresh 1 Mana Crystal for each card you've played this turn.
cards.flavor: The secret ingredient to the famous gloop!

cards.name: Stone Watcher
cards.text: Harmonizes with the highest-Cost minion in your hand.\nBattlecry: Copy a minion's Attack and Health.

cards.name: Arboreal Graft
cards.text: Choose a minion. Add two 10/10 copies to your hand that cost (10).
cards.flavor: Splintergraft is actually an Elwynn native. How she made it to The Witchwood is a story for another time.

cards.name: Emerald Emissary
cards.text: Battlecry: Refresh all Mana you spent on spells this turn.
cards.flavor: YES! The refreshments are here!

cards.name: Walking On A Dream
cards.text: Fill your hand with Dream Cards.
cards.flavor: Despite all the searching, Ysera never found the thrill of it.

cards.name: Jimi Entrix
cards.text: Ready for stage once you've played 7 minions that didn't start in your deck (wherever this is.)
cards.flavor: Once he's assembled his crowd, Jimi will provide an experience unlike any other.

cards.name: Jimi Entrix Ready
cards.text: Battlecry: Give your other minions "Deathrattle: Summon a 5/5 Ancient."

cards.name: Air Ascendant
cards.text: Battlecry: Give both players Overload: (1).
cards.flavor: Air Ascendant believes in equal opportunity insanity.

cards.name: Woodwind Wraith
cards.text: Windfury\nAfter this attacks, Overload: (1).
cards.flavor: His reeds are made from 100% all natural GMO-free trees.

cards.name: Two-Course Tuskarr
cards.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Restore 3 Health to both heroes.
cards.flavor: Every meal is a two-course meal if you cut it in half!

cards.name: Crescendo Sax
cards.text: After you attack a minion, gain +1 Attack.
cards.flavor: pp < ff

cards.name: Funkementalist
cards.text: Harmonizes with Elementals, but gains Overload: (1)
cards.flavor: We put this worgen next to an elemental! What happens next is shocking!

cards.name: Earth, Wind, and Fire
cards.text: Discover an Elemental, spell, or weapon. Overload: (1)
cards.flavor: Neptulon feels left out...

cards.name: Spirit Walk
cards.text: Give a minion "Deathrattle: Go dormant. Return when you spend all your Mana."
cards.flavor: I go to bed for 2 turns and you've already spent all the mana!

cards.name: Discord Giant
cards.text: Costs (1) less for each Battlecry and Deathrattle you've triggered.
cards.flavor: Well, it was either this or Teamspeak Giant.

cards.name: Giant Steps
cards.text: Discover a Giant. Giants have Taunt this game.
cards.flavor: Not even Arcane Keysmith could figure this one out.

cards.name: Nat'Khol
cards.text: Ready for stage once you have played 4 different Elementals (wherever this is).
cards.flavor: Harnessing Overload for cards?? That's eleMENTAL!

cards.name: Nat'Khol Ready
cards.text: Battlecry: Overload draws you cards instead of locking Mana.

cards.name: Tempo Up
cards.text: Summon two 3/2 Sorcerer's Apprentices.
cards.flavor: Two's a company, three's a crowd, four's an OTK.

cards.name: Pyrotech Dazzler
cards.text: Battlecry: Discover a spell. If you've spent all your Mana, reduce its Cost by (1).
cards.flavor: This is gonna be the biggest firework display Azeroth has EVER SEEN!

cards.name: Fleeting Vaporling
cards.text: Harmonizes with Secrets.
cards.flavor: She'll work for free if you tell her your Secrets.

cards.name: Amp It Up!
cards.text: Spend all your Mana. Draw that many cards.
cards.flavor: Forbidden amps.

cards.name: Bass Drop
cards.text: Deal 1 damage to all minions for each other spell you cast this turn.
cards.flavor: Oh, let's break it down!

cards.name: Strobe Lasers
cards.text: Secret: At the start of your turn, deal 7 damage randomly split among all enemy minions.
cards.flavor: The special effects team really went all out on this one.

cards.name: Record Scratch
cards.text: Replace your hand with how it was at the start of the turn (except this).
cards.flavor: *Freeze Frame* Yup, that's me. You're probably wondering how I ended up in this situation.

cards.name: Synth Ascriber
cards.text: Battlecry: The next card you play that isn't in your hand right now costs (3) less.
cards.flavor: Refuses to memorize her songs.

cards.name: The Final Countdown
cards.text: Refresh your Mana. Summon a Clock that counts down to victory.
cards.flavor: DJ Ark4n3 famously ends her live sets with an epic final countdown.

cards.name: DJ Ark4n3
cards.text: Ready for stage once 3 friendly Secrets have triggered this game.
cards.flavor: Right after a song ends, she's got another one coming in hot.

cards.name: DJ Ark4n3 Ready
cards.text: After a friendly Secret triggers, add a random Mage Secret to your hand. It costs (0).

cards.name: Wynnstock Clock
cards.text: Whenever you play a 10-Cost card, play it twice and count down by 1.

cards.name: Rootfin Bubbler
cards.text: After you cast a spell, summon a random 1-Cost minion.
cards.flavor: Bubblies and buddies!

cards.name: Ursa Major
cards.text: Taunt\nSpell Damage +1
cards.flavor: Ursa Students must go through rigorous Ursa Training at Ursa Universities to get their Ursa Majors.

cards.name: Perfect Serpent
cards.text: Costs (1) less for each minion you control.
cards.flavor: What a narcissssssisssst.

cards.name: Animal Collection
cards.text: If you're holding a Dragon, Discover a Dragon. Repeat for Murloc and Beast.
cards.flavor: Bonefish

cards.name: Alluring Panflute
cards.text: After you attack a minion, your Beasts attack it.
cards.flavor: A laser pointer also suffices.

cards.name: Restring
cards.text: Discover a spell. It costs (2) more this turn.
cards.flavor: You have to do this a lot when you work with panthers and lions.

cards.name: Vagabond Balladeer
cards.text: Battlecry: After your spells kill a minion this turn, refresh 2 Mana.
cards.flavor: Always wanted to be a Lizard Wizard, but lost himself along the way.

cards.name: Tribal Cheers
cards.text: Copy a friendly Murloc. Can target a Beast if you control a Murloc, or Dragon if you control both.
cards.flavor: Go Murlocs! GO BEASTS! GO DRAGONS!

cards.name: Desperation Row
cards.text: Cast 'Tracking' until your hand is full or deck is empty.
cards.flavor: Nazerfiti River is more colloquially known as Waterway 61 by local musicians and vagabonds.

cards.name: Rob Nalyd
cards.text: Ready for stage after you play 2 Beasts, 2 Dragons and 2 Murlocs (wherever this is).
cards.flavor: Take THAT, Noah!

cards.name: Rob Nalyd Ready
cards.text: Battlecry: Copy your Beasts, Dragons and Murlocs. (wherever they are)

cards.name: Rock of Ages
cards.flavor: Rocks can be Totems, too!

cards.name: One-Hit Wonder
cards.text: Rush, Taunt\nCan only attack once.
cards.flavor: She is good at getting things stuck in your head.

cards.name: Murlocstar
cards.text: Harmonizes with Murlocs.
cards.flavor: He's the frontman for Mrrgly and the Blowfish.

cards.name: Charming Bard
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of a 1-Cost minion.
cards.flavor: World renowned charmer of cute cats, dire moles, and Goldshire Footmen.

cards.name: Stormwind Security
cards.text: After this attacks a minion, gain +1/+1
cards.flavor: Our lawyers informed us writing a flavor text for this card would not be ideal.

cards.name: Contract Bouncer
cards.text: Taunt Battlecry: Add a Coin to your hand.
cards.flavor: "Okay, here's the money. Wait, who's the bouncer here?

cards.name: Locrian Lurker
cards.text: Battlecry: If you've cast a spell this turn, gain Stealth.
cards.flavor: A true closet fan.

cards.name: Honeypot Hoarder
cards.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, deal 1 damage to both heroes.
cards.flavor: While traveling out to the Festival, he wanted only the bear necessities.

cards.name: DEHTA Protester
cards.text: Battlecry: Discover a Beast, Dragon, or Murloc.
cards.flavor: Are they protesting against the DEHTA, or for it?

cards.name: Friendly Vendor
cards.text: Battlecry: Restore 1 Health to a damaged character. If that fully heals it, draw a card.
cards.flavor: Potion Vendor ain't got nothin' on her.

cards.name: Apprentice Luthier
cards.text: Battlecry: Equip a 2/2 Bow.
cards.flavor: "Violins" is never the answer.

cards.name: Rolling Stone
cards.text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, gain Rush.
cards.flavor: He's stuck between himself and a hard place.

cards.name: ETC Groupie
cards.text: Battlecry: Destroy a damaged minion.
cards.flavor: Honestly, the performance today by ETC was kinda- GREAT! IT WAS GREAT, FANTASTIC PERFORMANCE AS ALWAYS!

cards.name: Kobold Hypeman
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a random minion in each player's hand +2/+2.
cards.flavor: He just wants everyone to have fun.

cards.name: Eastvale Logger
cards.text: Battlecry: Give your hero Windfury this turn.
cards.flavor: I'll set 'em up...

cards.name: Constellar Devotee
cards.text: After your hero attacks a minion, this attacks it as well.
cards.flavor: And I'll knock 'em down.

cards.name: Restless Faedrake
cards.text: Battlecry: Silence an enchanted minion.
cards.flavor: NO FLASH PHOTOGRAPHY PERMITTED

cards.name: Overpacked Camper
cards.text: Battlecry: Your opponent equips a 2/2 Guitar.
cards.flavor: Here, hold this for m-WHY ARE YOU HITTING ME WITH IT

cards.name: Improv Artist
cards.text: Harmonizes with minions that didn't start in your deck.
cards.flavor: Honestly, they just showed up this morning.

cards.name: Groovy Goblin
cards.text: Harmonizes with spells that cost (3) or more.
cards.flavor: IT'S TIME TO ROCK AND ROLL!!                                       Sir, this is a library.

cards.name: Sly Songthief
cards.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Note to your hand.
cards.flavor: It's not stealing, it's sampling! Look it up!

cards.name: Disco Rager
cards.text: Lifesteal. Deathrattle: Deal 5 damage randomly split among all enemies.
cards.flavor: Malchezaar, this is NOT a suitable replacement for a disco ball.

cards.name: Silverfur Alpha
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/3 Beta for the player who controls fewer minions.
cards.flavor: Her subordinate is much more easily swayed.

cards.name: Red Carpet Escort
cards.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Draw a minion (Legendaries first).
cards.flavor: Right this way, Mr. Pagle.

cards.name: Heavyweight Headbanger
cards.text: Battlecry: Draw a card. This takes damage equal to the drawn card's Cost.
cards.flavor: Did you HAVE to ram straight into C'thun?

cards.name: Crooked Crooner
cards.text: Battlecry: Discover a Note.
cards.flavor: Getting random notes would better reflect his singing ability.

cards.name: Blastback Bat
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all enemy minions summoned last turn.
cards.flavor: Whose idea was it to do the sound check in a cave?

cards.name: Cittern Serenader
cards.text: Whenever you cast a spell on a friendly minion, summon two 1/1 Cats.
cards.flavor: Breathsing, bringer of the Cat-acalysm

cards.name: Bloodfang Widow
cards.text: Deathrattle: Deal damage to the enemy hero equal to this minion's Attack.
cards.flavor: Never leave your guitar case open in the woods.

cards.name: Wynnstock Broadcaster
cards.text: Battlecry: Repeat the Battlecry of the minion to the right of this.
cards.flavor: Please welcome our next act...

cards.name: Crafty Trashpick
cards.text: Battlecry: Equip a random weapon that was destroyed this turn.
cards.flavor: Thinking quickly, Crafty Trashpick fashioned an Ashbringer out of nothing but a squirrel, some tape, and an Ashbringer.

cards.name: Disc Spinner
cards.text: Your Battlecries and Deathrattles trigger twice.
cards.flavor: Just wait until she plays Bouncing Blades.

cards.name: Biggest Fan
cards.text: Harmonizes with the highest Cost card that started in your deck.
cards.flavor: Arena Fanatic: Finally! A worthy opponent!

cards.name: Record Dealbreaker
cards.text: Battlecry: The player with the more expensive hand draws a card.
cards.flavor: Once you're signed, he's never gonna give you up.

cards.name: One-Man Band
cards.text: Battlecry: Copy your other minions' enchantments onto this.
cards.flavor: At paranoia's poison door, twenty first century one-man band.

cards.name: Incognito Paparazzi
cards.text: Battlecry: Reveal a Legendary from your opponent's deck. Add a copy to your hand.
cards.flavor: Papa-paparazzi

cards.name: Burning Man
cards.text: Deathrattle: If this was summoned this turn, draw 2 cards.
cards.flavor: The pyrotechnics here are killer! No, really, someone get a medic.

cards.name: Backalley Bootlegger
cards.text: Stealth\nAfter this attacks and kills a minion, summon it for you.
cards.flavor: Right this way, Mr. umm... Pat Nagle?

cards.name: Serenade Songbird
cards.text: Battlecry: Discover a Harmonize card and a card that Harmonizes with it.
cards.flavor: She loves singing duets, all by herself. Who knew birds could throat sing?

cards.name: Dissonant Dirtpaw
cards.text: Battlecry: If you've played a minion this turn, add all 3 Notes to your hand.
cards.flavor: Dirtpaw GREAT at music! Dirtpaw play ALL the notes!

cards.name: Devlynn Styx
cards.text: Whenever you would burn a card, play it with random targets.
cards.flavor: The frontwoman for Blight Boar, she has one thing to say to her fans: "It's Devlynn, not Delvynn."

cards.name: Sig Nicious
cards.text: Start of Game: Replace your Hero Power with Request. Battlecry: Revert it and play Sig's Setlist.
cards.flavor: His set list is mostly covers, but the audience kind of prefers it that way.

cards.name: Spotlight Hogger
cards.text: Whenever a card targets this minion, gain +2/+2.
cards.flavor: No other gnoll gonna take Hogger spotlight this time!

cards.name: E.T.C. the Showstopper
cards.text: Battlecry: Equip a 3/3 Doomslayer.
cards.flavor: ETC was never ready for retirement. With the might of Doomslayer, he will reclaim his rightful title as the King of Metal, Battler of Bands, Master of Music, ETC.

cards.name: Death Metal Knight
cards.text: Battlecry: This turn only, replace your hand with cards costing (1) to (7).
cards.flavor: Jack of all time signatures, master of none. (Not even 4/4!)

cards.name: Samuro of the Flow
cards.text: Battlecry: If your left-most card is a spell, cast it and repeat this Battlecry.  (targets chosen randomly)
cards.flavor: Hey there, don't be scared, my name is Samuro

cards.name: Epicus Maximus
cards.text: Rush\nHarmonizes with a 1, 2, 3, and 4-Cost minion.
cards.flavor: Open the door, get on the floor. Everybody walk the shark-cannon-dinosaur!

cards.name: Do
cards.text: Deal 2 damage.

cards.name: Re
cards.text: Restore 5 Health.

cards.name: Mi
cards.text: Give a minion +1/+2.

cards.name: Song Request
cards.text: Discover a spell to add to Sig's Setlist.

cards.name: Doomslayer
cards.text: After you attack a minion, play a Power Chord Deluxe!

cards.name: We Are Murloc
cards.text: Summon four 1/1 Murlocs with Charge.

cards.name: Horde Power Hour
cards.text: Add a random Legendary minion to your hand. It costs (1).

cards.name: Rogues Did It
cards.text: Deal 6 damage randomly split among enemy minions.
